skills.name: Skeleton Mastery
desc: Passive - Increases Life And Damage
Of Raised Skeletons And Revived Creatures

skills.name: Golem Mastery
desc: Enhances Speed And Life Of All Your Golems

skills.name: Summon Resist
desc: Passive - Increases The Resistances
Of All Summoned Creatures

skills.name: Clay Golem
desc: Creates A Golem From The Earth
To Fight By Your Side

skills.name: Blood Golem
desc: Creates A Golem That Shares With You The Life
It Steals

skills.name: Iron Golem
desc: Transforms A Metallic Item Into A Golem That Gains
The Properties Of The Item

skills.name: Fire Golem
desc: Creates A Golem That Converts The Damage
It Receives From Fire Into Life

skills.name: Raise Skeleton
desc: Cast On The Corpse Of A Slain Monster,
This Raises A Skeleton Warrior That
Fights For You

skills.name: Raise Skeletal Mage
desc: Cast On The Corpse Of A Slain Monster,
This Raises A Skeleton Mage That
Fights For You

skills.name: Revive
desc: Returns A Monster To Life
To Fight By Your Side

skills.name: Poison Dagger
desc: Adds Poison To Your Dagger Attacks

skills.name: Poison Explosion
desc: Cast On The Corpse Of A Slain Monster
Toxic Gas Is Released
That Poisons Nearby Monsters

skills.name: Poison Nova
desc: Emits An Expanding Ring Of Concentrated Poison

skills.name: Teeth
desc: Fires A Barrage Of Summoned Barbed Teeth

skills.name: Corpse Explosion
desc: Cast On The Corpse Of A Slain Monster,
It Explodes, Damaging Nearby Enemies

skills.name: Bone Spear
desc: Summons A Deadly Spike Of Bone To Impale Your Enemies

skills.name: Bone Spirit
desc: Releases A Spirit Of The Restless Undead That
Tracks Its Target Or Finds One Of Its Own

skills.name: Bone Armor
desc: Creates An Orbiting Shield Of Bone
That Absorbs Melee Damage

skills.name: Bone Wall
desc: Creates An Impassable Barrier
Of Bone And Debris

skills.name: Bone Prison
desc: Creates A Barrier Of Fossilized Bone Around Your Target

skills.name: Dim Vision
desc: Curses A Group Of Monsters,
Reducing Their Vison Radius

skills.name: Confuse
desc: Curses A Monster To Force It To Attack Random Targets

skills.name: Attract
desc: Curses A Monster To Becom The
Target Of All Nearby Monsters
This Curse May Not Be Overridden By Another Curse

skills.name: Amplify Damage
desc: Curses A Group Of Enemies, Increasing
The Non-Magic Damage They Receive

skills.name: Iron Maiden
desc: Curses A Group Of Enemies, Causing Them
To Damage Themselves When Damaging Others

skills.name: Life Tap
desc: Curses A Group Of Monsters So That
Damaging Them Gives The Attacker Life

skills.name: Lower Resist
desc: Curses An Enemy To Take More Damage From All Magical Attacks
Lowers Resistances Of Monsters
Lowers Maximum Resistances Of Hostile Players

skills.name: Weaken
desc: Curses A Group Of Enemies,
Reducing The Amount Of Damage They Inflict

skills.name: Terror
desc: Curses A Group Of Monsters,
Causing Them To Flee In Terror

skills.name: Decrepify
desc: Curses A Group Of Enemies To Make Them
Slow, Weak And Take Amplified Damage
